workouts.name: Basic Hand-Eye Coordination Drills
workouts.description: Perform basic hand-eye coordination drills for 5 minutes.

workouts.name: Intermediate Hand-Eye Coordination Drills
workouts.description: Perform intermediate hand-eye coordination drills for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Advanced Hand-Eye Coordination Drills
workouts.description: Perform advanced hand-eye coordination drills for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Hand-Eye Coordination with Sparring
workouts.description: Perform hand-eye coordination drills with sparring for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Hand-Eye Coordination with Sparring and Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Perform hand-eye coordination drills with sparring and resistance bands for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Basic Hand-Eye Coordination with Sparring
workouts.description: Perform basic hand-eye coordination drills with sparring for 5 minutes.

workouts.name: Intermediate Hand-Eye Coordination with Sparring
workouts.description: Perform intermediate hand-eye coordination drills with sparring for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Advanced Hand-Eye Coordination with Sparring
workouts.description: Perform advanced hand-eye coordination drills with sparring for 15 minutes.

workout_groups.name: Hand-Eye Unique Techniques
workout_groups.description: Unique techniques to enhance hand-eye coordination.

workouts.name: Ball Toss Against Wall
workouts.description: Toss a ball against a wall and catch it to improve hand-eye coordination.

workouts.name: Juggling
workouts.description: Practice juggling with three balls to enhance coordination and focus.

workouts.name: Clap and Catch
workouts.description: Toss a ball, clap your hands, and catch it to improve reaction time.

workouts.name: Target Practice with Soft Objects
workouts.description: Throw soft objects at a target to improve accuracy and coordination.

workouts.name: Balloon Tap
workouts.description: Keep a balloon in the air by tapping it to enhance hand-eye coordination.

workouts.name: Coin Catch
workouts.description: Drop a coin and catch it before it hits the ground to improve reaction time.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Hand-Eye Unique Techniques
workout_groups.description: Advanced techniques to further enhance hand-eye coordination.

workouts.name: Two-Ball Juggling
workouts.description: Practice juggling with two balls in one hand to improve coordination and focus.

workouts.name: Reaction Ball Drills
workouts.description: Use a reaction ball to perform drills that enhance reaction time and coordination.

workouts.name: Wall Ball with Partner
workouts.description: Toss a ball against a wall with a partner, alternating catches to improve coordination.

workouts.name: Speed Bag Drills
workouts.description: Perform speed bag drills to enhance hand-eye coordination and rhythm.

workouts.name: Double Ball Toss
workouts.description: Toss two balls simultaneously and catch them to improve coordination and timing.

workouts.name: Advanced Target Practice
workouts.description: Throw objects at multiple targets to improve accuracy and hand-eye coordination.

workouts.name: Balloon Tap with Movement
workouts.description: Keep a balloon in the air while moving around to enhance coordination and agility.

workouts.name: Coin Catch with Partner
workouts.description: Drop a coin and have a partner catch it before it hits the ground to improve reaction time.
